env_paras.n_jobs: Number of jobs, taking effect during training
env_paras.n_stations: Number of machines, taking effect during training
env_paras.batch_size: Number of parallel instances during training
env_paras.ope_feat_dim: Dimension of the raw feature vectors of operation nodes
env_paras.ma_feat_dim: Dimension of the raw feature vectors of machine nodes
env_paras.valid_batch_size: Number of instances in single validation set
env_paras.is_single_station: Whether one operation can only allocate one station (machine)

model_paras.in_size_ma: Dimension of the raw feature vectors of machine nodes
model_paras.out_size_ma: Dimension of the embedding of machine nodes
model_paras.in_size_ope: Dimension of the raw feature vectors of operation nodes
model_paras.out_size_ope: Dimension of the embedding of operation nodes
model_paras.num_heads: len() means of the number of HGNN iterations, and the element means the number of heads of each HGNN (=1 in final experiment)

train_paras.max_iterations: Maximum number of iterations for training
train_paras.save_timestep: Number of iterations to validate and save the network
train_paras.update_timestep: Number of iterations to update the network
train_paras.viz: Turn on visdom to visualize the training process
train_paras.parallel_iter: Number of iterations to replace training instances

test_paras.n_jobs: Number of jobs, taking effect during predicting
test_paras.n_stations: Number of machines, taking effect during predicting
test_paras.batch_size: Number of parallel instances during predicting
test_paras.is_single_station: Whether one operation can only allocate one station (machine)
test_paras.source: The type of experimental comparison, simulation | public | private
